Headline: Temporary Westbound #152 Addison Reroute near Addison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #152 buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero, Addison and over regular route, due to street blockage near Addison/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line  trains are standing Clark/Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-Bound Blue Line  trains are standing Clark/Lake due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
